sentences.sContent: My dinosaur and I go to school.
sentences.sContent_eng: My dinosaur and I go to school.

sentences.sContent: You are the only dinosaur I know.
sentences.sContent_eng: You are the only dinosaur I know.
sentences.sCn: 你是我认识的唯一的恐龙。

sentences.sContent: How then would this dinosaur have moved?
sentences.sContent_eng: How then would this dinosaur have moved?
sentences.sCn: 那么这种恐龙要如何移动呢？

trans.tranOther: one of a group of  reptile s  that lived millions of years ago
